text: Because you can know this for sure: no fornicator, nor anyone who is morally corrupt or insatiable (actually an idolater),To have an insatiable desire for something (say, money) is to be dominated by that something; it has become a god, an idolatry. has any inheritance in the Kingdom of the Christ and God.According to the grammatical construction here, “Christ and God” refer to the same person.
